title: Software Developer
job_overview:
We’re Hiring: Part-Time Developer (Replit Experience Required)

Are you fluent in code and comfortable building in the Replit environment? We’re looking for a part-time developer who thrives in fast-paced, flexible settings and can help bring web-based projects to life quickly and cleanly.

What You’ll Do:
 • Build and maintain small- to mid-scale applications using Replit
 • Collaborate on feature design and functionality
 • Tackle quick-turnaround projects and prototypes
 • Debug, test, and iterate based on feedback

What We’re Looking For:
 • Strong familiarity with Replit (please share any public projects)
 • Proficiency in JavaScript and/or Python
 • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
 • Bonus if you’ve worked with APIs, automation, or frontend tools

Hours: Flexible, part-time
Pay: Based on experience

This is a great opportunity for a student, freelancer, or someone who loves building smart tools in smart ways.
